name: LAGORA
description:
Let's mate! Four players, one keyboard, one key to mate them all. You have one minute to populate the screen with your hopping bunnies.
But choose wisely: mate with the dominant colour and they might win by being the dominant colour on screen. Will you block your opponent's finger? Will you invite them to colaborate with you, and only you to block dominant player? The playstyle is yours to decide. On-site Team 9 of Game jam ARTE 2020.
